item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:

2. The Physics of Magic Windows (2021) (53 points | 2 comments)

8. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format (144 points | 34 comments)
9. Automating the most annoying aspects of blogging (16 points | 2 comments)
10. Google commits to buying power generated by nuclear-energy startup Kairos Power (408 points | 261 comments)
11. DeepSeek: Advancing theorem proving in LLMs through large-scale synthetic data (129 points | 32 comments)

13. Play 3.0 mini – A lightweight, reliable, cost-efficient Multilingual TTS model (127 points | 39 comments)
14. Show HN: X11 tool to share a screen area in any video meeting (233 points | 112 comments)
15. Remains of an ancient Greek structure found in Croatia (57 points | 16 comments)

22. The Wes Cook Archive (42 points | 8 comments)
23. Tesla Optimus Bots Were Remotely Operated at Cybercab Event (145 points | 96 comments)
24. The three-page paper that shook philosophy: Gettiers in software engineering (100 points | 67 comments)
25. Sound Lab – A Simple Analogue Synthesiser (70 points | 10 comments)
26. Cargo Airships Are Happening (33 points | 17 comments)
27. Meissonic, High-Resolution Text-to-Image Synthesis on consumer graphics cards (47 points | 3 comments)
28. Teaching the Largest Programming Lesson (29 points | 2 comments)

30. Exploring 120 years of timezones (2021) (84 points | 27 comments)
